sentences.sContent: The opinions of these drug warriors are immune to data: After decades of eradication efforts around the world, neither the acreage of land used to grow drugs nor the tonnage produced has shrunk.
sentences.sContent_eng: The opinions of these drug warriors are immune to data: After decades of eradication efforts around the world, neither the acreage of land used to grow drugs nor the tonnage produced has shrunk.
sentences.sCn: 缉毒勇士们的战绩无需赘述：在全世界开展了几十年的毒品肃清活动之后，种植毒品的土地面积和产出的毒品数量未见任何减少。

remMethod.val: acre (英亩) + age (集合名词后缀) → 英亩数

trans.tranOther: the area of a piece of land measured in acres
